patthana17.20:4.1: Abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.20:5.1: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana17.20:6.1: Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:6.2: Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:6.3: Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.20:8.1: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:8.2: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:8.3: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:9.1: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:9.2: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:9.3: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:10.1: Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:10.2: Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:10.3: Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:11.1: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:12.1: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:13.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pannarasa.
